title._content: Image taken from page 428 of 'Pen and Pencil Sketches of the Great Riots. An illustrated history of the Railroad and other great American Riots, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Pen and Pencil Sketches of the Great Riots. An illustrated history of the Railroad and other great American Riots, etc" Author: HEADLEY, Joel Tyler. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9604.bbb.8." Page: 428 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1882 Publisher: E. B. Treat Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001629498 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
